base_description: Tall, white cabinet with blue glass doors.
part_description: Two tall blue glass doors on the front, surrounded by a white frame. Rectangular shape with a flat top and base. Doors are centrally positioned and symmetrical.
internal_interaction_description: The two glass doors are likely hinged on the sides, allowing them to swing open and closed. The interior may contain shelves for storage, supported by the frame. The doors may have handles or magnetic closures to secure them when closed.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, providing storage and display space. It interacts with users who open the doors to access contents. The glass allows visibility of items inside, affecting how users approach organization.
